description:
Marica is back on the pages of DB, and this time Orlando gets his turn with this Japanese bondage sensation. She is capable of taking some of the toughest bondage positions, but we're not sure she's ready for the sadism that he brings to set.
Rope has some give, some room to move or wiggle, but not cold steel, and she realizes that quickly. She is trapped and helpless and made to endure her twisted fate at the hands of a true sadist.
title: No Escape
